SKU_S1_PASS.name: XRI Associate for Artocos Island Missions
SKU_S1_PASS.description: Unlimited access to rover features like infrared imaging, panoramas, and accelerated photo scheduling for missions on Artocos Island

SKU_ALL_PASS.name: XRI Pioneer
SKU_ALL_PASS.description: Unlimited access to rover features like infrared imaging, panoramas, and accelerated photo scheduling for all missions, including early access to missions at future locations

SKU_ALL_PASS_GIFT.name: Gift: XRI Pioneer
